title: Hinchinbrook diary
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and Colin Low
brief_description: An unobtrusive look at the farming community of Hinchinbrook, Quebec and its timeless lifestyle. The camera moves quietly through the lives of people busy doing what they have always done.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and Colin Low
